name: Eyeballs (themonstreking)
description:
Five powerful eyeballed monsters threaten the world! Shoot them with weird video game weapons!
Made for the Global Game Jam 2014


Art, Goat, Worm and Screamface design: FrankieSmileShow
Music: Cboyardee
Programming, Weapon Design and Bug/Snail design: TheMonstreKing

  • Six strange and powerful weapons to choose from (but the debug basic gun is probably the strongest?)
  • Five scary and dangerous bosses (the Watcher unfortunately only watches you and is not playable)
  • Bring a friend to shoot more projectiles
